Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 6 wickets with 9 balls remaining
Dhananjaya de Silva scored 66 not out in the chase
Post-Match Reflections: Andrew Fidel Fernando's report on the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wanindu Hasaranga's outstanding performance with the ball
Rashid Khan's frustration at not making a greater impact
Others: The loss means Afghanistan is out of reckoning for a semi-final spot
Sri Lanka's hopes remain alive, though they are slim
Rashid Khan had to be helped off the field due to a twisted knee
